{"id":300729841,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1580976719,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"52 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/300729841/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"13.2 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def trap(self, height):\n        if not height:\n            return 0\n        N = len(height)\n        ans = 0\n        lp, rp = 0, N-1\n        l_max_h, r_max_h = height[lp], height[rp]\n        while lp < rp:\n            if height[lp] < height[rp]:\n                lp += 1\n                ans += max(0, l_max_h - height[lp])\n                l_max_h = max(l_max_h, height[lp])\n            else:\n                rp -= 1\n                ans += max(0, r_max_h - height[rp])\n                r_max_h = max(r_max_h, height[rp])\n        return ans\n\n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
